title: jBPM BPMN2 (Full)
description: This is the jBPM BPMN 2.0 stencil set specification.

properties.title: 名称
properties.description: The descriptive name of the BPMN element.

properties.title: 文档
properties.description: This attribute is used to annotate the BPMN element, such as descriptions and other documentation.
properties.description_zh: 用于标注元素，例如描述和其他文档

properties.title: 可选择
properties.description: This attribute is used to set selectable properties for every node and edges.
properties.description_zh: 这个属性是用来为每个节点和边框的可选特性

properties.title: 文档
properties.description: This attribute is used to annotate the BPMN element, such as descriptions and other documentation.
properties.description_zh: 用于标注BPMN元素，比如描述和其他文档

properties.title: 可选择
properties.description: This attribute is used to set selectable properties for every node and edges.
properties.description_zh: 用于设置节点和边框的可选属性.

properties.title: 取消任务
properties.description: Denotes whether the activity should be cancelled or not, i.e., whether the boundary catch event acts as an error or an escalation. If the activity is not cancelled, multiple instances of that handler can run concurrently.
properties.description_zh: 表示该任务是否应该取消，i.e.，是否边界捕捉事件作为一个错误或升级。如果任务是不能取消的，处理程序可以同时运行多个实例

properties.title: 输出数据关联
properties.description: The Data Associations of the catch Event.

properties.title: 数据输出
properties.description: The Data Associations of the catch Event.

properties.title: 时间单位
properties.description_zh: 时间单位选项（秒，分，小时）

properties.title: 事件定义
properties.description: EventDefinitions (EventDefinition) is an attribute that defines the type of contained triggers expected for a catch Event.
properties.description_zh: 事件定义是一种属性，这种属性用来定义可以获得捕获事件的包含触发器的类型

properties.title: 数据输入关联
properties.description: The Data Associations of the throw Event.

properties.title: 数据输入
properties.description: The Data Associations of the throw Event.

properties.title: 时间单位
properties.description_zh: 时间单位选项（秒，分，小时）

properties.title: 等待完成
properties.description: Determine whether a throw compensation is performed synchronously or asynchronously.
properties.description_zh: 确定throw compensation行为是同步还是异步的

properties.title: 任务引用
properties.description: The activity related to the compensation event

properties.title: 中断
properties.description: This attribute denotes whether the Sub-Process encompassing the Event Sub-Process should be cancelled or not.
properties.description_zh: 这个属性表示围绕着子流程事件的子流程是否可以被取消

properties.title: 全局变量
properties.description_zh: 以逗号分隔的全局变量

properties.title: 版本
properties.description: This defines the Version number of the Diagram.

properties.title: 时间单位
properties.description_zh: 时间单位选项（秒，分，小时）

properties.title: 目标名空间
properties.description: Defines the XML namespace of the elements inside the document.
properties.description_zh: 定义XML文档中元素的命名空间

properties.title: 元素类型语言
properties.description: This attribute identifies the type system used by the elements of this Definition.
properties.description_zh: 这个属性标识系统定义元素使用的类型

properties.title: 项目主体引用
properties.description: Specification of the items that are stored or conveyed by the ItemAwareElement
properties.description_zh: 被存储项目或项目感知元素表达项目的规范

properties.title: 数据状态
properties.description: A reference to the DataState, which defines certain states for the data contained in the item.
properties.description_zh: 数据状态指向，定义项目中数据的确定状态

properties.title: 数据输入
properties.description: An InputSet is a collection of DataInput elements that together define a valid set of data inputs.
properties.description_zh: 输入集是数据输入元素的集合，一起定义了数据输入有效的集合

properties.title: 数据输出
properties.description: An OutputSet is a collection of DataOutputs elements that together may be produced as output from an Activity or Event.
properties.description_zh: 输出集是一个数据输出元素的集合，可以由任务或者事件产生

properties.title: 是否补偿
properties.description: A flag that identifies whether this activity is intended for the purposes of compensation.
properties.description_zh: 一个定义的标记，判断这个任务是否用于补偿的目的

properties.title: 是否补偿
properties.description: A flag that identifies whether this activity is intended for the purposes of compensation.
properties.description_zh: 一个定义的标记，判断这个任务是否用于补偿的目的

properties.title: 操作名称
properties.description: The descriptive name for the operation element.

properties.title: 输入消息名
properties.description: The descriptive name for the InMessage element

properties.title: 输入消息项目类别
properties.description: This defines the nature of the Item. Possible values are Physical or Information. The default value is Information.
properties.description_zh: 定义项目的性质，可能的值有Physical和Information，默认值为Information

properties.title: 输入消息结构
properties.description: This defines the nature of the Item. Possible values are Physical or Information. The default value is Information.
properties.description_zh: 定义项目的性质，可能的值有Physical和Information，默认值为Information

properties.title: 输入消息导入
properties.description: Identifies the location of the data structure and its format. If the importType attribute is left unspecified, the typeLanguage specified in the Definitions is assumed.
properties.description_zh: 定义数据结构的位置和格式，如果输入类型属性是不确定的，定义中的语言类型也是假设的

properties.title: 输入消息集合
properties.description: Setting this flag to true indicates that the actual data type is a collection.
properties.description_zh: 设置此标志为true，实际的数据类型是一个集合

properties.title: 输出消息名
properties.description: The descriptive name for the OutMessage element

properties.title: 输出消息项目类别
properties.description: This defines the nature of the Item. Possible values are Physical or Information. The default value is Information.
properties.description_zh: 定义项目的性质，可能的值有Physical和Information，默认值为Information

properties.title: 输出消息结构
properties.description: This defines the nature of the Item. Possible values are Physical or Information. The default value is Information.
properties.description_zh: 定义项目的性质，可能的值有Physical和Information，默认值为Information

properties.title: 输出消息导入
properties.description: Identifies the location of the data structure and its format. If the importType attribute is left unspecified, the typeLanguage specified in the Definitions is assumed.
properties.description_zh: 定义数据结构的位置和格式，如果输入类型属性是不确定的，定义中的语言类型也是假设的

properties.title: 输出消息结果集
properties.description: Setting this flag to true indicates that the actual data type is a collection.
properties.description_zh: 设置此标志为true，实际的数据类型是一个集合

properties.title: 前置测试
properties.description: Flag that controls whether the loop condition is evaluated at the beginning (testBefore = true) or at the end (testBefore = false)of the loop iteration.
properties.description_zh: 评估循环迭代的条件标记开始（开始前为true）或结束（开始前为false）

properties.title: 循环基数
properties.description: A numeric Expression that controls the number of Activity instances that will be created. This Expression MUST evaluate to an integer.
properties.description_zh: 一个数字表达式控制任务实例创建的个数，这个表达式的值必须是一个整数

properties.title: 循环数据输入
properties.description: A reference to a DataInput which is part of the Activity InputOutputSpecification. This DataInput is used to determine the number of Activity instances, one Activity instance per item in the collection of data stored in that DataInput element.
properties.description_zh: 数据输入的一个引用，他是任务输入输出规范的一部分，这个数据输入被用于确定任务实例的个数，一个任务实例中存储在数据输入元素集里的每一个项目

properties.title: 循环数据输出
properties.description: A reference to a DataOutput which is part of the Activity InputOutputSpecification.
properties.description_zh: 数据输出的一个引用，他是任务输入输出规范的一部分

properties.title: 输入数据项
properties.description: A Property, representing for every Activity instance the single item of the collection stored in the loopDataInput.
properties.description_zh: 一个属性，它代表每个任务实例存储在循环数据输入集合的项

properties.title: 输出数据项
properties.description: A Property, representing for every Activity instance the single item of the collection stored in the loopDataOutput.
properties.description_zh: 一个属性，它代表每个任务实例存储在循环数据输出集合的项

properties.title: 复杂行为定义：
properties.description: Controls when and which Events are thrown in case behavior is set to complex.
properties.description_zh: 控制何时，哪一个事件被抛出，以防行为被设置的过于复杂

properties.title: 单次行为事件引用
properties.description: The EventDefinition which is thrown when behavior is set to one and the first internal Activity instance has completed.
properties.description_zh: 当行为设置为一个以及第一个内部任务实例已经完成时抛出的定义事件

properties.title: 完成条件：
properties.description: This attribute defines a Boolean Expression that when evaluated to true, cancels the remaining Activity instances and produces a token.
properties.description_zh: 这个属性定义了一个布尔表达式，定义为true时取消剩余的任务实例并且产生一个令牌

properties.title: 脚本
properties.description: Script that can be run when the Task is performed. Related to the Script TaskType, if a script is not included, then the Task will act equivalent to a TaskType of None.
properties.description_zh: 任务运行时可以执行的脚本，如果脚本中不包含任务类型，这个任务运行时会当做任务类型为None处理

properties.title: 脚本语言
properties.description: Defines the script language. The script language MUST be provided if a script is provided.
properties.description_zh: 定义脚本语言，如果提供了脚本，必须提供脚本语言

properties.title: AdhocCancelRemainingInstances
properties.description: This attribute is used only if ordering is parallel. It determines whether running instances are cancelled when the completionCondition becomes true.
properties.description_zh: 此属性仅用于排序的并行，当完成条件为真时他决定正在运行的示例是否被取消

properties.title: AdhocCancelRemainingInstances
properties.description: This attribute is used only if ordering is parallel. It determines whether running instances are cancelled when the completionCondition becomes true.
properties.description_zh: 此属性仅用于排序的并行，当完成条件为真时他决定正在运行的示例是否被取消

properties.title: 流程类型
properties.description: The processType attribute Provides additional information about the level of abstraction modeled by this Process.
properties.description_zh: 提供流程抽象模型层级的额外信息

properties.title: 是否关闭
properties.description: A Boolean value specifying whether interactions, such as sending and receiving Messages and Events, not modeled in the Process can occur when the Process is executed or performed. If the value is true, they MAY NOT occur. If the value is false, they MAY occur.
properties.description_zh: 一个布尔值，指定是否相互作用 ，比如发送接收消息和事件时，流程执行时会发生不能模型化，当值为true时可能不会发生，当值为false时可能会发生

properties.title: 边界可见
properties.description: Defines if the rectangular boundary for the Pool is visible.
properties.description_zh: 定义泳道的矩形边界是否可见

stencils.title: BPMN图
stencils.description: A BPMN 2.0 Diagram.

properties.title: 名称
properties.description: The descriptive name of the BPMN element.

properties.title: 文档
properties.description: This attribute is used to annotate the BPMN element, such as descriptions and other documentation.
properties.description_zh: 这个属性被用来标注BPMN元素，比如描述和其他资料

stencils.title: 任务
stencils.description: A task is a unit of work - the job to be performed.
stencils.description_zh: 任务是工作的单元（将被执行的工作）

properties.title: 入口动作
properties.description_zh: 在进入任务时执行的动作

properties.title: 出口动作
properties.description_zh: 在退出任务时执行的动作

properties.title: 办理者
properties.description_zh: 逗号分隔的办理者列表

properties.title: 会签条件
properties.description_zh: 会签通过条件，可设人数百分比或人数

properties.title: 角色
properties.description: he group id that is responsible for executing the human task
properties.description_zh: 负责执行此用户任务的用户组id

properties.title: 关联数据
properties.description: The data associated with this task

properties.title: 可跳过
properties.description: Specifies whether the human task can be skipped
properties.description_zh: 指定用户任务是否可以跳过

properties.title: 优先级
properties.description: An integer indicating the priority of the human task
properties.description_zh: 一个整数表示人工任务的优先级

properties.title: 时间单位
properties.description_zh: 时间单位选项（秒，分，小时）

stencils.title: 可重用子流程
stencils.description: A reusable subprocess. It can be used to invoke another process.
stencils.description_zh: 可重复使用的子流程，被用来调用另外的流程

properties.title: 入口动作
properties.description_zh: 在进入任务时执行的动作

properties.title: 出口动作
properties.description_zh: 在退出任务时执行的动作

properties.title: 独立
properties.description: If set to true the child process is started as an independent process.

properties.title: 等待完成
properties.description: If true this sub-process node will only continue if the child process that was started has terminated its execution (completed or aborted)

stencils.title: 多实例子流程
stencils.description: A multiple instances subprocess. Allows to execute the contained process segment multiple times.
stencils.description_zh: 多实例子流程。运行执行包含的流程片段多次

properties.title: 集合变量
properties.description: Name of a variable that represents the collection of elements that should be iterated over.
properties.description_zh: 需要迭代的元素集合的变量名

properties.title: 元素变量
properties.description: Name of the variable to contain the current element from the collection.
properties.description_zh: 迭代集合中元素时当前元素的变量名

properties.title: 入口动作
properties.description_zh: 在进入任务时执行的动作

properties.title: 出口动作
properties.description_zh: 在退出任务时执行的动作

stencils.title: 嵌入子流程
stencils.description: A subprocess is a decomposable activity. An expanded subprocess contains a valid BPMN diagram.
stencils.description_zh: 分解任务的子流程。一个扩展的子流程包含有效的BPMN流程图

properties.title: 入口动作
properties.description_zh: 在进入任务时执行的动作

properties.title: 出口动作
properties.description_zh: 在退出任务时执行的动作

stencils.title: AdHoc子流程
stencils.description: A subprocess is a decomposable activity. An expanded subprocess contains a valid BPMN diagram.
stencils.description_zh: 分解任务的子流程。一个扩展的子流程包含有效的BPMN流程图

properties.title: 入口动作
properties.description_zh: 在进入任务时执行的动作

properties.title: 出口动作
properties.description_zh: 在退出任务时执行的动作

stencils.title: 分支
stencils.description: When splitting, it routes the sequence flow to exactly one of the outgoing branches based on conditions. When merging, it awaits one incoming branch to complete before triggering the outgoing flow.
stencils.description_zh: 当分支时它根据当前条件把顺序流路由到正确的输出分支，当合并时等待一个输入分支完成后再触发输出流

stencils.title: 基于事件的网关
stencils.description: Is always followed by catching events or receive tasks. Sequence flow is routed to the subsequent event/task which happens first.
stencils.description_zh: 常被捕获事件或接收任务跟随，顺序流被路由到后来第一个发生的事件/任务上

stencils.title: 同步
stencils.description: When used to split the sequence flow, all outgoing branches are activated simultaneously. When merging parallel branches it waits for all incoming branches to complete before triggering the outgoing flow.
stencils.description_zh: 当被用来分隔顺序流时，所有的输出分支同时被激活，当合并并行分支时等待所有的输入分支完结后才触发输出流

stencils.title: 条件同步
stencils.description: When splitting, one or more branches are activated based on branching conditions. When merging, it awaits all active incoming branches to complete.
stencils.description_zh: 当有分支时，一个或多个分支将根据分支条件被激活。当分支合并时，所有的分支流程完结后再进行合并

stencils.title: 泳道
stencils.description: Pools and Lanes represent responsibilities for activities in a process. A pool or a lane can be an organization, a role, or a system. Lanes sub-divide pools or other lanes hierarchically.
stencils.description_zh: 池和泳道代表一个流程中任务的职责，一个池或者泳道可以是一个组织，一个角色或者一个系统。泳道清晰地分隔一个池或者其他泳道

stencils.title: 组
stencils.description: An arbitrary set of objects can be defined as a Group to show that they logically belong together.
stencils.description_zh: 任意一组对象可以被定义为一组，表明他们在逻辑上为同一类

stencils.title: 注解
stencils.description: Any object can be associated with a Text Annotation to provide additional documentation.
stencils.description_zh: 任何对象都可以关联文本注释以提供额外的文档

stencils.title: 数据对象
stencils.description: A Data Object represents information flowing through the process, such as business documents, e-mails or letters.
stencils.description_zh: 一个数据对象代表流程中的信息流，如商业文件，电子邮件或信件

stencils.title: 开始
stencils.description: Untyped start event.
stencils.description_zh: 非类型化的开始事件

stencils.title: 消息开始事件
stencils.description: A process instance is started on receive of a message.
stencils.description_zh: 当收到消息后流程实例才被启动

stencils.title: 定时开始事件
stencils.description: A process instance is started on cyclic timer events, points in time, after time spans or timeouts.
stencils.description_zh: 一个流程实例启动的循环定时器事件，可以设置时间点，时间跨度或超时后启动

stencils.title: 升级开始事件
stencils.description: Reacts on an escalation to another role in the organization. This event is only used inside of a event subprocess.
stencils.description_zh: 对升级组织中的另一个角色，这个事件仅被用于子流程事件的内部

stencils.title: 条件开始事件
stencils.description: A process instance is started based on changed business conditions or matching business rules.
stencils.description_zh: 一个流程实例在业务条件变化或业务规则匹配的基础上被启动

stencils.title: 错误开始事件
stencils.description: Catches named errors. This event is only used inside of a event subprocess.
stencils.description_zh: 捕获命名错误，这个事件仅被用于子流程事件内

stencils.title: 补偿启动事件
stencils.description: Compensation handling. This event is only used inside of a event subprocess.
stencils.description_zh: 补偿处理。这个事件仅被用于子流程事件内

stencils.title: 信号开始事件
stencils.description: A process instance is started based on signalling across different processes. (One signal thrown can be caught multiple times)
stencils.description_zh: 一个流程实例的启动基于不同流程的信号。（发出一个信号可以被多次捕获）

stencils.title: 中间事件捕捉
stencils.description: This event reacts on the arrival of a message.
stencils.description_zh: 响应消息到来的事件

stencils.title: 定时
stencils.description: Process execution is delayed until a certain point in time is reached or a particular duration is over.
stencils.description_zh: 流程执行被延迟，直到一个确定的时间点，或者一个时间段结束。

properties.title: 时间单位
properties.description_zh: 时间单位选项（秒，分，小时）

stencils.title: 升级中间事件
stencils.description: This event reacts on the escalation of a case. It needs to be attached to the boundary of an activity.
stencils.description_zh: 这个事件对案件升级产生响应。它需要被连接到一个任务的边界

stencils.title: 有条件的中间事件
stencils.description: Process execution is delayed until a changed business condition or business rule matches.
stencils.description_zh: 流程执行被延迟，直到业务条件变更，或者业务规则匹配

stencils.title: 错误的中间事件
stencils.description: Catches a named error, which was thrown be an inner scope (e.g. subprocess). This event needs to be attached to the boundary of an activity.
stencils.description_zh: 捕获内部抛出的命名错误（比如子流程）这个事件需要被附在任务的边界上。

stencils.title: 信号中间事件
stencils.description: Process execution is delayed until a particular signal is catched. Signalling can happen across different processes.
stencils.description_zh: 流程执行延迟直到确切的信号被捕获，这个信号可以产生自不同的流程

stencils.title: 中间事件
stencils.description: This event marks the occurrence of a particular business event. Process execution is not delayed.
stencils.description_zh: 这一事件标志着一个特定的业务事件的发生。流程执行不延迟

stencils.title: 信息中间事件
stencils.description: The throwing message event sends a message to a communication partner and afterwards continues process execution.
stencils.description_zh: 抛出消息事件发送一个消息给通信伙伴之后继续执行过程

stencils.title: 升级中间事件
stencils.description: This event triggers the escalation of the case to another role in the organisation. After this, process execution is resumed.
stencils.description_zh: 这个事件触发组织中另一个角色的的案件升级，之后流程被恢复执行。

stencils.title: 信号中间事件
stencils.description: The throwing signal event fires up a signal. Afterwards it continues process execution. One signal thrown can be caught multiple times by different catching signal events.
stencils.description_zh: 抛出信号事件发出一个信号，之后继续流程执行，一个信号可以被不同的捕获信号事件捕获多次

stencils.title: 结束
stencils.description: The untyped end event typically marks the standard end of a process.
stencils.description_zh: 非类型化事件通常标志着一个过程的标准结束

stencils.title: 消息结束事件
stencils.description: At the end of the process, a message is sent.
stencils.description_zh: 在流程的结束，一个消息被发送出去

stencils.title: 升级结束事件
stencils.description: The case is escalated with the end of the process.
stencils.description_zh: 随着流程的结束案件被升级

stencils.title: 错误结束事件
stencils.description: The process ends in an error state. As result a named error is thrown.
stencils.description_zh: 流程在错误的状态结束时，一个命名错误的异常被作为结果抛出

stencils.title: 取消结束事件
stencils.description: Triggering cancellation of a transaction.
stencils.description_zh: 触发取消交易

stencils.title: 补偿结束事件
stencils.description: Triggering compensation as final process step.
stencils.description_zh: 触发补偿作为最后的步骤

stencils.title: 信号结束事件
stencils.description: At the end of the process, a signal is thrown. (One signal thrown can be caught multiple times)
stencils.description_zh: 流程结束时一个信号被发出（一个发出的信号可以被多次捕获）

stencils.title: 终止结束事件
stencils.description: Triggering the immediate termination of a process instance. All steps still in execution in parallel branches are terminated.
stencils.description_zh: 触发流程实例的立即终止，所有的步骤仍然在并行分支执行终止

stencils.title: 顺序流
stencils.description: Sequence Flow defines the execution order of activities.
stencils.description_zh: 顺序流定义了任务的执行顺序

properties.title: 条件类型
properties.description: Determine the typ of the flow object.

properties.title: 立即
properties.description: An optional Boolean value specifying whether Activities or Choreography Activities not in the model containing the Sequence Flow can occur between the elements connected by the Sequence Flow. If the value is true, they MAY NOT occur. If the value is false, they MAY occur. Also see the isClosed attribute on Process, Choreography, and Collaboration.
properties.description_zh: 一个可选的布尔值指定任务或者不包含在顺序流模型中的动作是否能发生顺序流元素的连接，如果值为真可能不会发生，如果值为假可能发生，这还要看流程中的是否关闭属性

properties.title: 是否条件流
properties.description: System intern variable to set the Diamond invisible, if sourceShape is a gateway and ConditionType is set to Expression
properties.description_zh: 系统内部变量，设置Diamond不可见，如果源形状是一个网关，条件类型设置为表达式

stencils.title: 关联（无方向）
stencils.description: Attaching a data object with an Undirected Association to a sequence flow indicates hand-over of information between the activities involved.
stencils.description_zh: 在序列流上使用无方向的关联来绑定一个数据对象，以指示所涉及的活动之间的信息传递

properties.title: 职责
properties.description: Describes the type of the responsibility according to RACI.

stencils.title: 关联（单向）
stencils.description: A Directed Association indicates information flow. A data object can be read at the start of an activity or written upon completion.
stencils.description_zh: 有方向的关联指示信息流
